channel.title: Discord Store- SLT World
channel.description: Discord Store - Recreated by SLT World

item.title: The Adventures of PepeL
item.description: The Adventures of PepeL. Complete custom puzzles, and challenging sitations. Make your way up to the leader who has been tormenting the lands. Developed by Ande and Published by Fantasy Studios, Dream World.

item.title: The Adventures of PepeL
item.description: The Adventures of PepeL. Complete custom puzzles, and challenging sitations. Make your way up to the leader who has been tormenting the lands. Developed by Ande and Published by Fantasy Studios, Dream World.

item.title: Jumplats
item.description: Jump through different levels in a game based on "the floor is lava".

item.title: ZombsRoyale.io
item.description: Dive into the #1 2D battle royale game in the world - now on Discord. 100 player, real-time multiplayer action with vibrant graphics and dynamic gameplay all packed in 5 minute matches. How many victories can you get while decking yourself out in the fresh cosmetics?

item.title: Realm Royale
item.description: Conquer the Realm in this fantasy Battle Royale! Choose a class, then loot, or craft, deadly weapons and powerful abilities to forge your own victory. Explore a fantasy world from horseback while outrunning the deadly fog. Can you survive the first 100-person fantasy Battle Royale?

item.title: Minion Masters
item.description: Minion Masters is a fast-paced online 1 vs 1 and 2 vs 2 Minion Battler.

item.title: Warframe
item.description: Warframe is a cooperative free-to-play third person online action game set in an evolving sci-fi world.

item.title: Paladins
item.description: Join 35+ million players in Paladins, the free-to-play fantasy team-based shooter sensation. Wield guns and magic as a legendary Champion of the Realm, customizing your core set of abilities to play exactly how you want to play.

item.title: Avoid
item.description: AVOID™ is a game made and published by FX Studios™

item.title: SandBoxes
item.description: A multiplayer sandbox with game modes

item.title: Patch Quest
item.description: If you're looking to playtest the latest version of Patch Quest... then you've come to the right channel! Click install to download it for free (Windows only)

item.title: Heroes & Generals WWII
item.description: Heroes & Generals WWII is a full on, all-out WAR experience. Thousands of players fighting one massive clash of nations. The first to capture 15 cities takes the glory.

item.title: SCP: Secret Laboratory
item.description: Deep within the SCP Foundation during a containment breach, many of the anomalies have bypassed security and escaped from their chambers - without peaceful intentions. Become site personnel, a re-containment agent, or an anomalous entity and fight to take control of or escape the facility!

item.title: Star Sonata 2
item.description: Star Sonata 2 is a space-themed massively multiplayer online game that combines elements of action, RPG, and empire creation into a truly unique MMO experience. Explore the sandbox style universe, build persistent bases, construct trade ships, and even fight your way to the top and claim the Emperor’s Throne!

item.title: PickCrafter
item.description: PickCrafter is an incremental idle crafting clicker game that lets you take control of a pickaxe and dig deep into the biomes. Even while idle or offline! Just start tapping to mine. Upgrade Legendary Pickaxes, collect all the blocks and gear, and unlock all the biomes. Digging for gold has never been more exciting! Tap to start, then upgrade your Artifacts and Abilities to mine deeper, faster.

item.title: DBots Verification Simulator
item.description: Time to verify some robots in this super realistic robot verification simulator!

item.title: Light From The Butt
item.description: 'Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that' Martin Luther King, Jr. Enjoy retrowavy environments and futuristic car chases. As soon as you're fast enough (not up to lightspeed), you can destroy your enemies with buttlazer (yeah...)

item.title: Forestir
item.description: Start as an apple who loves to eat other fruits. The other fruits are on a quest to defeat you before you eat the whole forest. Progress into fruit and vegetables.

item.title: Cycle 23
item.description: A fast-paced shooter but you're stuck in a time loop. First you think it's an arcade game: simple controls, powerful upgrades, and intense dogfights. But you’re living the same day over and over, trying to find out who the enemy are, and what they want.

item.title: SOMA
item.description: Just remember there’s no fighting back, either you outsmart your enemies or you get ready to run.

item.title: Banner Saga 3
item.description: As the world crumbles around you, how will you survive when the Darkness draws near, and who will you trust with the fate of the world?

item.title: Subnautica
item.description: Descend into the depths of an alien underwater world filled with wonder and peril!

item.title: Parkasaurus
item.description: Care for your dino friends by crafting the perfect exhibits, gifting them the cutest hats, and travelling back in time to rescue them from demise!

item.title: Masters of Anima
item.description: Delve into an original adventure and defy the forces of evil in strategic, action-packed battles.

item.title: King of the Hat
item.description: Throw your hat, risk your life. Crush your opponents hat before they crush yours in this fast-paced, hat-based fighting game.

item.title: Subnautica: Below Zero
item.description: Dive into a freezing underwater adventure on an alien planet. Set one year after the original Subnautica, Below Zero challenges you to survive a disaster at an alien research station on Planet 4546B. Craft tools, scavenge for supplies, and unravel the next chapter in the Subnautica story.

item.title: Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire
item.description: Pursue a rogue god over land and sea in the sequel to the multi-award-winning RPG Pillars of Eternity.

item.title: AT SUNDOWN: Shots in the Dark
item.description: A hide-and-seek shooter in the dark where light is your enemy, as 4 players compete in a deathmatch to be the best!

item.title: Call of Cthulhu®
item.description: Cryptic clues, shadowy figures, and pure terror bar your way as you fight to retain your sanity and solve an otherworldly mystery.

item.title: Amnesia: The Dark Descent
item.description: Something emerges out of the darkness. It's approaching. Fast.

item.title: Hex! Run
item.description: 8 Action-packed levels that will test, push, and challenge your limits. Prove you're the best!
